featured.text: Overall, many moral lessons from the last match are highlighted.
The overall tone (attitude) of this passage is _________.
Overall, most people simply aren’t exercising or moving around enough to counteract all the harm that can result from sitting nine hours or more a day.
Of course, in determining overall standards of living of Americans, factors __(40)__ household composition and family size need also to be taken into consideration.

definition.example: The overall performance of the team was impressive.
